Participation - Class in com.exort.entity
This class represents the data in the table participation create table `participation`() character_id int, arrangement_id int, primary key(character_id, arrangement_id), foreign key cid(character_id) references `character`(id) on delete no action on update no action, foreign key aid(arrangement_id) references `arrangement`(id) on delete no action on update no action ) engine=InnoDB default charset=utf8;

This interface determines all operations on the table participation in database
